title: Information Security Policy (ISO 27001 A.5)
content: This policy defines the framework for setting information security objectives and direction.

title: Acceptable Use Policy
content: Guidelines for the acceptable use of company IT resources including internet and email.

title: Data Classification & Handling Policy
content: Standards for classifying data (Public, Internal, Confidential, Restricted) and handling requirements.

title: Password & Authentication Policy
content: Requirements for password complexity, rotation, and multi-factor authentication.

title: Access Control Policy (ISO A.9)
content: Procedures for granting, reviewing, and revoking access to systems and data.

title: IT Change Management Policy (ISO 20000-1)
content: Formal process for requesting, testing, and approving changes to IT infrastructure.

title: Patch Management Policy
content: Schedule and requirements for applying security patches to servers and workstations.

title: Incident Management Policy (ISO 27035)
content: Framework for detecting, reporting, and responding to information security incidents.

title: Risk Management Framework (ISO 27005)
content: Methodology for identifying, assessing, and treating information security risks.

title: Vendor & Third-Party Security Policy
content: Security requirements for third-party vendors accessing company systems.

title: Network Security Policy
content: Standards for firewalls, routers, VPNs, and network segmentation.

title: Email & Communication Security Policy
content: Rules regarding encryption, spam filtering, and sensitive data in emails.

title: Remote Work & VPN Usage Policy
content: Guidelines for securing remote access and working from off-site locations.

title: Bring Your Own Device (BYOD) Policy
content: Security controls and privacy expectations for personal devices used for work.

title: Physical Security & Facility Access Policy
content: Controls for physical access to server rooms and office premises.

title: Backup & Retention Policy
content: Frequency, storage, and retention periods for data backups.

title: Disaster Recovery & Business Continuity Policy
content: Plans for recovering critical business functions after a major disruption.

title: Software Licensing & Compliance Policy
content: Rules for purchasing, installing, and auditing software to ensure legal compliance.

title: Data Privacy & GDPR Compliance Guidelines
content: Procedures for handling personal data in compliance with privacy laws.

title: Asset Management Policy (ISO 19770)
content: Lifecycle management of hardware and software assets.

content: Step-by-step process for creating new user accounts in AD and business apps.

title: User Account De-Provisioning SOP

title: How do I reset my password?
content: Use the self-service portal at identity.company.com.

title: How do I connect to company Wi-Fi?
content: Select 'Corp-Wifi' and use your AD credentials.

title: How do I request new software?
content: Submit a Service Request ticket in this portal.

title: How do I report an IT incident?
content: Click 'New Ticket' and select 'Incident'.

title: How do I request access to shared folders?
content: Have your manager email IT or submit a ticket.

title: How do I connect to VPN?
content: Launch Cisco AnyConnect and enter vpn.company.com.

title: How do I update my system?
content: Updates are pushed automatically every Tuesday night.

title: How do I use MFA?
content: Install MS Authenticator on your phone.

title: How do I access email from mobile?
content: Download Outlook app and sign in with email.

title: What should I do if I suspect a phishing email?
content: Do not click links. Forward to security@company.com.

title: What is the acceptable use policy?
content: See Policy POL-002. No illegal or bandwidth-heavy use.

title: When should I update my antivirus?
content: It updates automatically daily.

title: How do I back up my files?
content: Save to OneDrive or the P: Drive. Local files are not backed up.

title: How do I request hardware replacement?
content: Submit a ticket. Manager approval required.

title: Laptop stolen or lost?
content: Report to Police and IT immediately for remote wipe.

title: How do I access archived data?
content: Contact IT to retrieve tapes or cold storage data.

title: How do I reset my MFA token?
content: Contact Helpdesk to reset your registration.

title: How do I access remote desktop?
content: You need VPN access first. See SOP-007.

title: Updating personal info?
content: Update via the HR Portal.

title: How do I open a support ticket?
content: Use the 'New Ticket' button on your dashboard.
